title: If Stray Kids members were to be in Hogwarts, what houses would they be in? - Quora

response.answer_text: Chan- ravenclaw minho- Slytherin changbin- gryffindor hyunjin- gryffindor/ ravenclaw jisung- why do I feel like he is all four of them lmao felix- slytherin seungmin- Hufflepuff OR gryffindor? jeongin- Hufflepuff man this all could be completely wrong sorry! xD
